snippet.title: Indie SRPG: Deg-Deg The Ravenous Trailer
snippet.description:
Deg-Deg the Ravenous is an SRPG about Goblins, and their quest to retake the Golden Croc. With gameplay inspired by Fire Emblem, Super Robot Wars, and Ogre Battle. Made by me Panfuricus, and FlamingKlub.

Available for free now!

Join our Discord for the Game for Downloads/Updates/Discussion: https://discord.gg/nd9fvtK
